content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) with a furnace at (-27, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) 
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(1, -60)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Furnace at (2, -56)

### Smelting Area at position(1, 1)
Consists of following entities:
- Three furnaces at (1, 1), (3, 1), and (2, 7)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)
- Output chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (14.5, 12.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserter at (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at position(21.5, 15.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chest at (17.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 14.5)
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserter at (23.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 34.5)
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if the target location is clear of other entities before attempting to place a boiler or other structures
- Use the entity dimensions to ensure enough clear space for placement

### Errors with fluid connections
- Ensure you have the required items (like pipes) in inventory before attempting to connect fluid entities
- Verify the connection points are valid and within reach
- Make sure the fluid entities are properly aligned for connection
